column4: is there any linux/ubuntu solution for viewing web pages which depend on activex controls?

I was trying to configure a jetdirect by it's builin web page, but the page depends on installing an activex control from the jetdirect to the pc, and windows rejects the activex control for security reasons
oh...you should be able to telnet to a jetdirect to configure it.  Usually they don't need much configuring though
